Package domainlayer

Class UIController

java.lang.Object
domainlayer.UIController
public class UIController
extends java.lang.Object
A class to account for the "Controller" - GRASP principle. All calls that are made from the UI Layer to the domain layer, pass through this Controller. The Controller then redirects these calls to the appropriate domain layer classes. This lowers the coupling between the domain and UI layer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    UIController()
    Initialise this Controller with the given Document.

    • addHref

      public void addHref​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String href)
      Add a href value associated to a bookmark to the corresponding class in the domain layer.
      Parameters:
      name - : The name of the bookmark that's associated to the given href attribute.
      href - : The href of the bookmark that will be added to the domain layer.
